author: cms-met
body:
This PR ports the last MET changes developed in 80X, including the muon removal tools developed for Moriond 2017.

Performances and objects are untouched. THis PR corresponds to the complement of what was included lately in #16174 

Additions :
- bad muon removal code for MET
- EGamma tools for MET
- 2016 legacy MET filters

Packages touched :
- CommonTools/PileupAlgos
- PhysicsTools/PatAlgos
- PhysicsTools/PatUtils
- RecoMET/METFilters

Limited matrix tests are successful
Automatically ported from CMSSW_9_0_X #17524 (original by @cms-met).
Please wait for a new IB (12 to 24H) before requesting to test this PR.
title: Port of the last 80X MET  (#16174) changes in 90X
